long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace your existing bug report process with a single click. Sound too good to be true?

In just one click, share a report containing:  
üé• Video replay of the issue that just occurred or a editable screenshot
üìã Reproduction steps with every action, click and input recorded 
üõ†Ô∏è Technical details for devs: network requests, console logs and browser info  

Which means no more:  
‚ùå Retracing your steps and reproducing issues 
‚ùå Writing paragraphs to explain what happened 
‚ùå Answering questions from confused colleagues  

Dummi is the easiest way to create and share bug reports. Designed specifically for QAs, Product Managers, Devs and everyone that loves finding and reporting bugs at lightning speed.  

Install the extension to get started in under 30 seconds and start squashing bugs with Dummi now!

1. Install and pin the extension
2. Click on it to create your account (no password required, and support for SSO)
3. You are ready to go; click on the extension, then chose how you want to capture your issue
    ~90 second replay of your last actions
    start a new video recording
    take and annotate a screenshot
4. Easily set up a workspace to securely share reports and invite your teammates.
